attributes.action: ENGLISH GOVERNMENT OR EU - we do not need both
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: NOW THAT THIS GOVERNMENT HAS YET AGAIN SIGNED AWAY MORE OF OUR RIGHTS TO THE EU - I HAVE NO FAITH IN WHAT THEY SAY.  WE ALSO HAVE NO NEED OF PAYING TWICE FOR THE SAME THING SO EITHER WE SHOULD BE OUT OF THE EU OR WE DO NOT NEED A GOVERNMENT HERE.  I PROPOSE WE GET OUT OF EU

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
